mapper.sql: JT_ID, TARGET_CODE, AN_TARGET_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_jyfx_target_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_jyfx_target_tb (JT_ID, TARGET_CODE, AN_TARGET_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{jtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anTargetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

JT_ID,

CREATE_TIME,

update ht_jyfx_target_tb
JT_ID = #{record.jtId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},

CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_jyfx_target_tb set JT_ID = #{record.jtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TARGET_CODE = #{record.targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AN_TARGET_CODE = #{record.anTargetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_jyfx_target_tb
TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AN_TARGET_CODE = #{anTargetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where JT_ID = #{jtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ht_jyfx_target_tb set TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AN_TARGET_CODE = #{anTargetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JT_ID = #{jtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

TARGET_CODE,
AN_TARGET_CODE,
OP_TYPE,

mapper.update: UPDATE ht_jyfx_target_tb SET OP_TYPE = 'D' WHERE TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from ht_jyfx_target_tb where TARGET_CODE = #{anTargetCode,jdbcType=BIGINT} and OP_TYPE != 'D'

select
from ht_jyfx_target_tb where TARGET_CODE = #{anTargetCode,jdbcType=BIGINT} and OP_TYPE = 'D'
mapper.update:
update ht_jyfx_target_tb
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AN_TARGET_CODE = #{anTargetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
